title: Freelance
presentation: I am available for new freelance software development contracts regarding full-stack development and/or digital audio applications.
profile: My freelancer profile can be found on {comet} and {malt}.

services.title: Full-stack development
services.subtitle: Fancy a new online service?
services.content: I can help on choosing and orchestrating the proper technological stack, developing software for web-services (back-end, API), web-apps (front-end), mobile apps, and implementing a strategy for continuous integration and deployment.

services.title: Digital audio
services.subtitle: An audio and/or music related project in mind?
services.content: I can help making those waves happen by engineering multi-platform (MacOS, Windows, Linux) and performant software for desktop applications and audio plug-ins.
